titleStmt.title: News from Hell: or, The devils court in an uproar His devilships falling sick, upon the news of the pope and poperies likely downfal. His last will and testament. His legacies to the pope and jesuits; and to other sinners in particular. Written by S.V.
titleStmt.author: S. V.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
